text: You get what you pay for. If too many requirements, take MAS.

Tourist visa not hard la as long as you are working (in mnc is a plus) and have money. If not working then susah a bit.Legroom is ok, but no way better than mas la. Still the difference is not that much or as bad as what some ktards say.Duduk office everyday also not say every office got ergonomic seats la. Your chance of getting back problem from sitting at work is higher. How often does a person takes flights anyways, even most frequent flyers also once or twice a month la. No need to over exaggerate la.
